Description: Bold Real Estate, a dynamic and innovative real estate company, is seeking highly motivated and talented Real Estate Agents to join our team. As a commission-based agent, you will have the opportunity to work remotely from anywhere in Dubai and earn a generous commission of 70% on all successful transactions in both the off-plan market and secondary market.Skills
Skills:
Proven working experience as a Real Estate Agent in Dubai or a similar market, with experience in both off-plan and secondary market transactions.
Deep understanding of the Dubai real estate market, including current trends and property values in both the off-plan and secondary markets.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills, with the ability to build rapport and trust with clients.
Strong sales acumen and a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets in both the off-plan and secondary markets.
Self-motivated and driven to succeed in a competitive market.
Ability to work independently and remotely, managing your own schedule and prioritizing tasks effectively.
Proficiency in using real estate CRM software and other relevant tools.
Valid UAE driver's license and access to reliable transportation.
